text: us ki khaum ke, kafiro ke sardaro ne jawaab diya ke hum to tujhe apne jaisa insaan hee dekhte hai aur tere tabedaro ko bhi hum dekhte hai ke ye log waaze taur par sivae neech logo ke, aur koi nahi, jo be-sonche samjhe (tumhari pairvi kar rahe hai) hum to tumhari kisi qism ki bartari apne upar nahi dekh rahe, balke hum to tumhe jhoota samajh rahe hai
